CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Campaign Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( LEN( Name)<5,"Meaningful Campaign Name, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL( Type ,""), "Type, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Status ,""), "Status, ","")&""&IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH( StartDate )))=0, "Start Date, ","")&""&IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH( EndDate )))=0, "End Date, ","")&""&IF(NumberOfContacts + NumberOfLeads = 0, "No Associated Members, ","")&""&IF( LEN(TEXT( ExpectedRevenue ))=0, "Expected Revenue",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
